attributes.action: Make the sale of pork scratchings compulsory in establishments that serve ale for consumption on the premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fed up with the deminishing range of bar snacks available in local pubs, especially in and around the capital?  What's so "uncool" about a humble but tasty treat?

This is your chance to make a stand for a Great British snack.  Sign this petition!

(In anticipation, I've already bought shares in Mr Porky)
